#! /usr/bin/bash

##
## Variables
##
export mysub="d86da6b7-31a4-48f7-8bc1-2a643f539ca7"                 # Subscription ID
export myrg="rg-precert-F5-AODS-OnPrem"                             # AODS resource group 
export region="eastus"                                              # region
export extLocationRG="pct1-zyswugihttxk2-hostedresources-763640b7"  # Extended location resource-group
export extLocation="pct1-zyswugihttxk2-cstm-loc"                    # Extended location name
export aodsCluster="pct1-zyswugihttxk2"                             # AODS cluster name
export myCsNet="BigIP-CSN"                                          # Cloud-services network 
export isolationRG="RG_vSRX_Tenant"                                 # Isolation domain resource group
export isolationDomain="L3-ISD-vSRX-UnTrusted-Instance1"            # Isolation domain
export l3OamNet="L3-BigIP-OAM"                                      # OAM L3 network
export l3ClientNet="L3-BigIPClient"                                 # BIG-IP client-side L3 network 
export l3ServerNet="L3-BigIPServer"                                 # BIG-IP server-side L3 network

export netFabricName=""                                             # Network Fabric

export pubKey=""
export imageUrl="jesseacr.azurecr.io/bigip-v1515:2"


## Object IDs
# Network fabric ID
export netFabricID="/subscriptions/${mysub}/resourceGroups/${myrg}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedNetworkFabric/networkFabrics/${netFabricName}"

# Isolation domain ID
export isoDomainID="/subscriptions/${mysub}/resourceGroups/${isolationRG}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedNetworkFabric/l3IsolationDomains/${isolationDomain}"

# Extended location ID
export extLocId="/subscriptions/${mysub}/resourceGroups/${extLocationRG}/providers/Microsoft.ExtendedLocation/customLocations/${myLoc}"

# Cloud-services network ID
export myCsnId="/subscriptions/${mysub}/resourceGroups/${myrg}/providers/Microsoft.NetworkCloud/cloudServicesNetworks/${myCsn}"

# OAM network ID
export l3OamNetId="/subscriptions/${mysub}/resourceGroups/${myrg}/providers/Microsoft.NetworkCloud/l3Networks/${l3OamNet}"

# Client network ID
export l3ClientNetId="/subscriptions/${mysub}/resourceGroups/${myrg}/providers/Microsoft.NetworkCloud/l3Networks/${l3ClientNet}"

# Server network ID
export l3ServerNetId="/subscriptions/${mysub}/resourceGroups/${myrg}/providers/Microsoft.NetworkCloud/l3Networks/${l3ClientNet}"

## /Variables
